title: How to Unlock Characters in Donkey Kong Barrel Blast

steps.headline: To unlock the elderly Cranky Kong, race him and beat him in the third level (also called the 24th mission).
After that, a screen message will come up saying "You have unlocked Cranky Kong!

text: To unlock the elderly Cranky Kong, race him and beat him in the third level (also called the 24th mission).  After that, a screen message will come up saying "You have unlocked Cranky Kong! ".
